类 RedisServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.java2nb.novel.common.cache.impl.RedisServiceImpl
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CacheService

    @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="spring.redis",
                       name="host",
                       matchIfMissing=false)
 @Service
public class RedisServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CacheService
    Redis缓存服务实现

    2020/5/27
